function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Collaborating with other businesses may lead to increased exposure to contagious diseases if proper precautions are not taken.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and potential outbreak within the business ecosystem.","Mitigation":"Enforce strict hygiene measures and health protocols when collaborating with other businesses. Educate and train staff on disease prevention strategies.","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, online ordering platforms, UV disinfection systems.","People":"Food truck owners, staff, and customers, as well as employees and patrons of collaborating businesses.","Owner":"Food truck owners, collaborating businesses, local health authorities."}]}
